verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sarvia, \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* turned \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*,

\w Sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Thecua, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* fetched \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thence \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*: Feign thyself \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w mourner|strong="H0056"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3847"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* anointed \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* thou mayest \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w manner|strong="H1697"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Thecua \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, she \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* worshipped, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Save|strong="H3467"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* matter \w with|strong="H0376"\w* thee? \w She|strong="H0061"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: Alas, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*: \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H0559"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thy handmaid \w had|strong="H0369"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0369"\w* quarrelled \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w each|strong="H0259"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* part \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* kindred \w rising|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thy handmaid, saith: \w Deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heir|strong="H3423"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* seek \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w quench|strong="H3518"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* spark \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H1115"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w nor|strong="H1571"\w* remainder \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*: Go \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Thecua \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w Upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w be|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: \w but|strong="H4428"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w be|strong="H0113"\w* guiltless.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: If \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* ought \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* thee \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w next|strong="H1350"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* kin \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w take|strong="H2142"\w* revenge, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kill|strong="H7843"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth, \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w hair|strong="H8185"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* thy handmaid \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w one|strong="H0802"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* hath \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* sin, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* own exile?

\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H0622"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* return \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* fall \w down|strong="H5064"\w* \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* perish, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* recalleth, meaning \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w cast|strong="H5080"\w* \w off|strong="H5375"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* altogether perish.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* am \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w maybe|strong="H0194"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w request|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* hath hearkened \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* \w out|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H0376"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w out|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* thy handmaid \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* sacrifice. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w neither|strong="H5973"\w* moved \w with|strong="H5973"\w* blessing nor cursing: wherefore \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* answering, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*: \w Hide|strong="H3582"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* thee. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*? \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w By|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* health \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w neither|strong="H0518"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H8041"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0518"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3231"\w*, \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy handmaid.

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* \w come|strong="H5437"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w form|strong="H5437"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w speech|strong="H1697"\w*, thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, commanded \w this|strong="H2088"\w*: \w but|strong="H0834"\w* thou, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* king, art \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, according \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* ail \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* am appeased \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* granted thy \w request|strong="H1697"\w*: \w Go|strong="H7725"\w* therefore \w and|strong="H4428"\w* fetch \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w falling|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, adored, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* hath \w understood|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast fulfilled \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w request|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.
